description:
Ride with confidence. The XC3 have a precise fit system and robust upper that lets your feet breathe when you put the hammer down. Equipped with a glass reinforced nylon midsole, you get great power transfer.

  • Synthetic leather upper is easy to clean and breathes well
  • Glass fibre reinforced nylon sole provides a stiff pedalling platform
  • Boa® L6 dial fit system keeps the shoe aero
  • Offset strap design reduces pressure on the top of the foot
  • XC racing pattern tread offers secure grip on the ground and easy cleat engagement on the pedal
name: Shimano XC300 Cycling Shoes - Unisex
